mention.text: the assassination of President Pak Chong-hui
then Central Intelligence Agency Director Kim Chae-kyu in October 1979
Army Chief of Staff and martial law commander
the Seoul District Public Prosecutor 's Office
The Seoul District Public Prosecutor 's Office
an accomplice in the slaying of Pak Chong-hui in October 1979
a mutiny by the `` new military elite '' to topple the government
